Welcome! I’m an Amsterdam based software engineer with a background in particle physics.

I have over 6 years of experience in the data and ML realm. I’m skilled in API development (FastAPI), Infrastructure as code (Terraform), CICD, DevOps, distributed computing (Spark), containerisation (Docker, K8s), cloud computing.

Experiences

Software Engineer

March 2024 - Present
Little Lions Child Coaching

Little Lions Child Coaching is a Cape Town-based NGO that provides mental health workshops to children in townships in Africa (South Africa, Kenya). I started Digital Lions: a private web app that enables local staff to provide and gather insights in attendance data. Within nine months we went from scratch to a multi environment, live application: app.littlelionschildcoaching.com.

  • Setup a Github organization with repository
  • System design: designed and built the database, API, user management, RBAC.
  • DevOps: containerisation (Docker), CICD, networking (domain administration), security

Platform Engineer

Nov 2023 - Present
Ahold Delhaize

Building the API that manages user access for data on the advanced analytics data platform.

Tech stack: Azure, Databricks, Unity Catalog, Python FastAPI, Terraform, Github, Docker.

Platform Engineer

Jan 2023 - Nov 2023
ABN AMRO, Amsterdam

Part of the platform enablement team that provides the Azure infrastructure for multiple applications using a modular Terraform setup. Played a key role in setting up the Azure cloud infrastructure to enable implementation of OpenAI’s ChatGPT.

Machine Learning Engineer

Sep 2019 - Jan 2023
ABN AMRO, Amsterdam

Started as a data science trainee but soon transitioned into ML engineering. Operationalised multiple ML (and non-ML) usecases on the banks ML platform:

  • email classification/routing
  • named entity recognition
  • outlier detection for foreign exchange trades
  • large scale (> 5TB) document classification
  • lead generation for commercial banking
  • outlier detection for transaction monitoring

Tech stack: Azure, Databricks, Docker, Python, Spark, MLflow, Azure DevOps.

Python Developer

Nov 2018 - Aug 2019
GUTS Tickets

GUTS Tickets is a ticketing company that provides event ticketing on the blockchain. Data analysis and Python development. Started as a part-time job next to my studies and continued as full-time job.

Analyst

Jun 2016 - Aug 2017
NRG Value

Data analytics in Excel/VBA. This was a part-time (20hrs/week) job next to my academic degrees.

Projects

Since university I have been enthousiastic about programming.
